text: Juna manisaharula'i taureta anurupa acarana karyanvayana garna adesa di'iyo ani uniharule tyasako palana garenan. Ta unako drstanta tyasa gadahako jasto cha. Jasale dherai kitaba bokeko cha. Sahrai nai naramro udaharana cha ti manisaharuko jasale allahaka ayataharula'i jhuthala'e. Allahale yasta atyacariharula'i sojho marga dekha'umdainan
